attributes.additional_details: Most political leaders, past and present, will never achieve what that man has achieved. For many years he was the lonely voice of millions of Brits. That deserves recognition.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage deserves recognition for his role in helping deliver Brexit to the UK

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
